@Cacheable(cacheNames = "user", key = "'id_'+#userId") public User get(int userId) { â€‹ // get from db â€‹ log.debug("[++] get userId=" + userId); User user = new User(); user.setId(userId); name=" + name); User user = get(userId); user.setName(name); return user; } public void innerCall(int userId) { â€‹ log.debug("[++] innerCall"); â€‹ get(userId); }}
